text: Teraemi yathayathabharae akasasamuha arau prthirai srsti karaiche. Teraemi raatira dbaraa dinaka acchadita karae arau raatika acchadita karae dinara dbaraa. Surya arau candraka teraemi karaiche niyamadhina. Pratyeka'i eta nirdharaita samaya laike gati karae. Jani thoraa! Te'om maha paraakramasali, ksamasila
